page.title: 10 THE CORNER SHOP-WEEDON BEC
page.content: The children in our class use the corner shop most often.It sells sweets,groceries and vegetables.We call the owner Dave. Dave sells about 1350 items a day and serves over eighty children on a school day.He opens his shop every day of the week and is usually open from 06.30 until 18.00 hours. Dave told us that he buys his own groceries from his own shop.The only medicines he sells are headache tablets. He has been robbed twice,the robbers took wine,cigarettes and money. Dave does not think that small shops like the corner shop will survive for very long.Many people use the big supermarkets in Northampton and Daventry.
